code: import React from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{ShoppingCart,Heart,User,Sparkles,LogOut}from'lucide-react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{user,logout}=useAuth();const{getItemCount}=useCart();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{logout();navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"bg-white shadow-md px-6 py-4 flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-purple-600",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"AI Dress Mart"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"flex items-center gap-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"hover:text-purple-600",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/shop",className:"hover:text-purple-600",children:"Shop"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"flex items-center gap-1 hover:text-red-600",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogOut,{size:16}),"Logout"]})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"hover:text-purple-600",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/cart",className:"flex items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingCart,{size:24}),getItemCount()>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"absolute -top-2 -right-2 bg-red-600 text-white text-xs w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center rounded-full",children:getItemCount()})]})})]})]});};export default Header;
